verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w end|strong="H7093"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w after|strong="H7093"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w own|strong="H1961"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*:

\w He|strong="H0834"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* Hiram \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w caused|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*.
\w He|strong="H8010"\w* went \w also|strong="H8010"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* Emath Suba, \w and|strong="H2388"\w* possessed \w it|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0853"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* Palmira \w in|strong="H1129"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w desert|strong="H4057"\w*, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w other|strong="H3605"\w* strong \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w in|strong="H1129"\w* Emath.

\w And|strong="H0853"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w Beth-horon|strong="H1032"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w upper|strong="H5945"\w*, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w Beth-horon|strong="H1032"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* nether, \w walled|strong="H2346"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w with|strong="H1280"\w* Rates \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w bars|strong="H1280"\w* \w and|strong="H0853"\w* locks.

Balaath \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* strong \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w Solomon’s|strong="H8010"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*. \w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* mind, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w designed|strong="H1129"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* Libanus, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* dominion.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w left|strong="H3498"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Hethites, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Amorrhites, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Pherezites, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Hevites, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jebusites|strong="H2983"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* stock \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*:

\w Of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H0310"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* posterity, \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* slain, \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w made|strong="H0834"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* tributaries, unto \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w none|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* serve \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* king’s \w works|strong="H4399"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w chief|strong="H8269"\w* \w captains|strong="H8269"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w rulers|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3967"\w* all \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w chief|strong="H8269"\w* \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon’s|strong="H8010"\w* \w army|strong="H5971"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w two|strong="H3967"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w*, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* taught \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* removed \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Pharao \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* sanctified: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0227"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w offered|strong="H5927"\w* holocausts \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w porch|strong="H0197"\w*,

\w That|strong="H3117"\w* \w every|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* an \w offering|strong="H5927"\w* might \w be|strong="H1697"\w* \w made|strong="H5927"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w it|strong="H5927"\w* according \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* ordinance \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w new|strong="H2320"\w* \w moons|strong="H2320"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w festival|strong="H2282"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w* \w a|strong="H5927"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w say|strong="H1697"\w*, \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w unleavened|strong="H4682"\w* \w bread|strong="H4682"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w weeks|strong="H7620"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* tabernacles.

\w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w appointed|strong="H5975"\w* \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w order|strong="H4941"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w offices|strong="H4931"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* ministries: \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w order|strong="H4941"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* give \w praise|strong="H1984"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* \w before|strong="H5048"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w duty|strong="H4931"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* porters \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w divisions|strong="H4256"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w had|strong="H0430"\w* \w commanded|strong="H4687"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w departed|strong="H5493"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w commanded|strong="H4687"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* keeping \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w*.

\w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* charges \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w*, \w from|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* founded \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* wherein \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w finished|strong="H3615"\w* \w it|strong="H5704"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0227"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Asiongaber, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Ailath, \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* coast \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Red \w Sea|strong="H3220"\w*, which \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* Hiram \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w ships|strong="H0591"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w skillful|strong="H3045"\w* mariners, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w Solomon’s|strong="H8010"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Ophir|strong="H0211"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* thence \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w talents|strong="H3603"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w it|strong="H3045"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*.
